sentences.sentence: Such managers have an enormous stake in succeeding, so they invariably overstate the potential of their new technologies.
sentences.translation: 这些管理者与成功有着巨大的利害关系，因此他们总是夸大新技术的潜力。

sentences.sentence: He tends to overstate his case when talking politics.
sentences.translation: 他一谈政治便流于夸夸其谈。
